headline: Pet Healthcare Spending Is Soaring. These 5 Stocks Are Positioned to Clean Up
summary: The steep increase in pet healthcare costs have doubled over the past five years, according to NPR. There are a number of reasons for this trend, but the overall numbers are large, reaching $39.8 billion in 2024. Some projections estimate that pet healthcare will swell to $112 billion by 2030. As a result, veterinary healthcare ... Pet Healthcare Spending Is Soaring. These 5 Stocks Are Positioned to Clean Up
